ISSUE.TITLE: Environment variables lost after crash restart
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If a docker deployment crashes **with environment variables specified in the now command** then those environment variables are lost after the restart. now --docker -d -f -e NODE_ENV=production Test project: https://github.com/pqvst/envtest/tree/master

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-bash] add `stdio: inherit` to builder.sh script (#143) So that the build logs of the bash script are sent to the deployment logs.
